title: What time is the Breaking Bad movie El Camino released on Netflix?
text:
Aaron Paul returns as troubled character Jesse Pinkman (Picture: Ben Rothstein / Netflix)

Easily the biggest Netflix event for October, Breaking Bad’s movie follow-up El Camino drops on the streaming service this week and the TV stars Aaron Paul and Bryan Cranston reunited to celebrate at the premiere on Tuesday.

The Breaking Bad movie will answer fans’ long-awaited question about what actually happened to Jesse Pinkman after he escaped the clutches of white supremacists in the final episode of the hit show which aired six years ago.

The show’s creator Vince Gilligan is back at the helm for the film and we already know that there are many returning Breaking Bad characters from the original series – although perhaps not Walter White – so the film is set to live up to the very high expectations of fans.

So, when can you watch El Camino on Netflix and what time is the hotly anticipated movie dropping?

Advertisement

Advertisement

What time is the Breaking Bad movie El Camino released on Netflix?

El Camino: A Breaking Bad Movie releases 11 October on Netflix, so there’s not long to wait at all now until we learn where Jesse’s journey in that Chevrolet El Camino took him.

To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The film will be available to stream from 8am and fans are already hyped to see the return of their favourite show to the big screen in movie form.

‘I still can’t believe that we’ll see a Breaking Bad movie made by Vince Gilligan!’ wrote one excited fan on Twitter while another added: ‘I’m going to take the day off work to watch it.’

MORE: Breaking Bad brings back Old Joe for El Camino movie – but will he help Jesse?

MORE: Breaking Bad recap ahead of El Camino: What happened to Jesse Pinkman and Walter White at the end of season 5?
description: Easily the biggest Netflix event for October, Breaking Bad’s movie follow-up El Camino drops on the streaming service this week.
